subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Television
Steroids
Testosterone
lead_paragraph: The 2007 Tour de France starts July 7, and Versus, which has rights to the race through next year, is faced with carrying the elite event of a sport whose credibility is at a nadir.
